channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: When Danielle is left to raise her daughter after her husband goes missing and is presumed dead, she begins to tell her daughter bedtime stories of her father.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Carol For Two
channel.desc: When talented singer Violette takes a job as a waitress in New York, things get complicated when her duet partner sets her up with a friend but starts developing feelings himself.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Christmas For The Ages
channel.desc: Prompted by their youngest granddaughter, four generations of women celebrate Christmas and family in the style of the 40s, 60s, 90s and today.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Miracle In Bethlehem, PA
channel.desc: After adopting a baby just before Christmas, Mary gets stuck in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania. There's no room at the inn, so they have to stay with the innkeeper's brother, Joe.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Following Yonder Star
channel.desc: Abby Marshall, once celebrated for her role as an inspirational mother on TV, spends a chaotic Christmas at a remote Vermont retreat. Can her own holiday wishes come true.
